info.title: Important Details You Should Know About Our Procedures

paragraphs.sperm: Sperm used for sperm donation procedures are imported from the European Sperm Bank in Denmark, which has Europe's largest sperm donor pool, and have been approved by the TRNC Ministry of Health.
paragraphs.egg: The eggs used for egg donor procedures are eggs that we collect ourselves with follicle tracking that we progress under our own supervision at our hospital; fresh eggs are given to the recipient (you) and fertilization with sperm takes place on the same day.
paragraphs.urology: MESA, TESE, MICRO-TESE procedures are performed by our specialist Urology Doctors.
